sources.name: FAAmasterFile
sources.script:
source(output(
		{N-Number} as string,
		{Serial Number} as string,
		{MFR MDL Code} as string,
		{Eng MFR Code} as string,
		{Year MFR} as string,
		{Type Registrant} as string,
		Name as string,
		{Street 1} as string,
		Street2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZIP as string,
		Region as string,
		{County } as string,
		Country as string,
		{Last Activity Date} as string,
		{Cert Issue Date} as string,
		{Certification Requested } as string,
		{Type Aircraft} as string,
		{Type Engine} as string,
		{Status Code} as string,
		{Mode S Code} as string,
		{Fractional  Ownership} as string,
		{Airworthiness Date} as string,
		{Other Name 1} as string,
		{Other Name 2} as string,
		{Other Name 3} as string,
		{Other Name 4} as string,
		{Other Name 5} as string,
		{Expiration Date} as string,
		{Unique ID} as string,
		{Kit MFR Code} as string,
		{Kit Model} as string,
		{Mose S Code Hex} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> FAAmasterFile

sources.name: FAAaircraftFile
sources.script:
source(output(
		{MFR-NAME} as string,
		{TYPE-AIRCRAFT} as string,
		{TYPE-ENGINE} as string,
		{AC-CATEGORY} as string,
		{AMAC-TC-BUILT} as string,
		{NUMBER-ENGINES} as string,
		{NUMBER-SEATS} as string,
		{AC-WEIGHT} as string,
		SPEED as string,
		{MFR-MDL-CODE} as string,
		{KIT-CODE} as string,
		EMPTY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> FAAaircraftFile

transformations.name: Join1
transformations.script:
FAAmasterFile, FAAaircraftFile join({MFR MDL Code} == {MFR-MDL-CODE},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1

transformations.name: Select1
transformations.script:
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		{N-Number},
		{Serial Number},
		{Year MFR},
		Name,
		{Mode S Code},
		{Airworthiness Date},
		{MFR-NAME},
		{NUMBER-ENGINES},
		{NUMBER-SEATS}
	))~> Select1
